Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.virtualView

Class ClientHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.PSP38.server.virtualView.ClientHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, java.util.Observer
public class ClientHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, java.lang.Runnable
Class used to handling data from/to the specific client
Author:
Maximilien Groh (10683107), Matteo Mita (10487862)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ClientHandler​(java.net.Socket clientSocket)
    Constructor method of the class Initialises the input and output Stream for the class and starts the thread used to receive data and manage the connection whit the specific client
